title: Maya Hawke is ready for fall in a burgundy coat and scarf as she strolls with actor Charlie Plummer
text:
She made a splash this summer with dueling roles in Netflix's Stranger Things and Quentin Tarantino's Once Upon A Time In Hollywood.

Maya Hawke looked ready for the crisp fall weather on Thursday as she strolled around New York City with her friend and fellow actor Charlie Plummer, 20.

The 21–year–old actress was bundled up in a warm red jacket while Charlie stuck with a simpler sweater.

Bundled up: Maya Hawke, 21, looked ready for the crisp fall weather on Thursday as she strolled around New York City with her friend and fellow actor Charlie Plummer, 20

Maya looked like the spitting version of her mother Uma Thurman in her loose-fitting burgundy coat, which she left unbuttoned to show a hint of her plunging black blouse.

The 5ft9in actress and model paired her top with a stylish pair of gray plaid slacks that culminated in black socks with multi-colored polka dots.

She added a lighter touch to the dark outfit with a pair of white laceless sneakers and she had a thick black leather handbag slung across her body.

Charlie had his own autumn style with a a navy blue sweater reading 'Sad Girls Club' over the breast.

He also had on a pair of dark blue jeans and gray checker sneakers.

The All The Money In The World actor had a black and white bandana tied around his neck and he toted along a book for some light reading later.

Take five: The two actors went for their walk after enjoying lunch in Manhattan's West Village neighborhood, and they stopped for a smoke breaking before heading along

The two actors went for their walk after enjoying lunch in Manhattan's West Village neighborhood, and they stopped for a smoke breaking before heading along.

Since winning her way into fans' hearts on Stranger Things as Robin Buckley, who worked alongside Steve (Joe Keery) at an ice cream shop, Maya has signed on to appear in the upcoming film Mainstream alongside Andrew Garfield, Jason Schwartzman, Euphoria's Alexa Demie and Nat Wolff.

Few details about the drama have been released, but it will be directed by Gia Coppola, granddaughter of legendary director Francis Ford Coppola and niece of Sofia Coppola.

Maya is the daughter of actors Ethan Hawke and Uma Thurman, who were married in 1998 and separated in 2003. The couple also share a son, Levon Hawke, 17.

Breakout role: Maya is a rising star thanks to her winning performance as newcomer Robin in season 3 of Netflix's Stranger Things (pictured with Gaten Matarazzo and Joe Keery)

Charlie has appeared in films and on television steadily since the start of the decade, but he rose to prominence in 2017 with his starring role in All The Money In The World as kidnapped Getty heir John Paul Getty III.

The Ridley Scott–directed movie was the subject of controversy after Kevin Spacey's performance as J. Paul Getty was excised in the wake of multiple allegations of sexual assault against him and replaced with a new performance by Oscar-winner Christopher Plummer.

Charlie also appeared in the Sundance favorite Share, which arrived on HBO this summer, and he plays one of the leads on the new Hulu series Looking For Alaska, which premiered earlier this month.
description: Stranger Things' Maya Hawke enjoyed a peaceful stroll through Manhattan's West Village with her friend and fellow actor Charlie Plummer. The actress was dressed for fall in a burgundy coat.
